remarks: A subring of the base ring induces a subring of polynomials. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jul-2015.)
statement:
subrgply1.s $e |- S = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
subrgply1.h $e |- H = ( R |`s T ) $.
subrgply1.u $e |- U = ( Poly1 ` H ) $.
subrgply1.b $e |- B = ( Base ` U ) $.
subrgply1 $p |- ( T e. ( SubRing ` R ) -> B e. ( SubRing ` S ) ) $.
